üåë Dark and üåï Light mode with auto detection made easy with Nuxt.

[![nuxt-color-mode](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/904724/79349768-f09cf080-7f36-11ea-93bb-20fae8c94811.gif){animated-image=""}](https://color-mode.nuxtjs.app/){rel="nofollow"}

## Features {#features dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#features){#user-content-features aria-label="Permalink: Features"}

-   Nuxt 3 and Nuxt Bridge support
-   Add `.${color}-mode` class to `<html>` for easy CSS theming
-   Force a page to a specific color mode (perfect for incremental development)
-   Works with client-side and universal rendering
-   Auto detect system [color-mode](https://drafts.csswg.org/mediaqueries-5/#descdef-media-prefers-color-mode){rel="nofollow"}
-   Supports IE9+ üë¥

[üìñ ¬†Read more](https://color-mode.nuxtjs.org/){rel="nofollow"}

**Note**: v3 of `@nuxtjs/color-mode` is compatible with [Nuxt 3 and Nuxt Bridge](https://nuxt.com/){rel="nofollow"}. If you\'re looking for the previous version of this module, check out [the previous docs](https://v2.color-mode.nuxtjs.org/){rel="nofollow"}, or [read more about the differences](https://color-mode.nuxtjs.org/#migrating-to-v3){rel="nofollow"}.

## Contributing {#contributing dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#contributing){#user-content-contributing aria-label="Permalink: Contributing"}

You can contribute to this module online with CodeSandBox:

[![Edit \@nuxtjs/color-mode](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ecd139ba9847d0c77607c86339eb8ee6939ca85143a92ae16ebf20f58325e1b6/68747470733a2f2f636f646573616e64626f782e696f2f7374617469632f696d672f706c61792d636f646573616e64626f782e737667){canonical-src="https://codesandbox.io/static/img/play-codesandbox.svg"}](https://codesandbox.io/s/github/nuxt-modules/color-mode/tree/main/?fontsize=14&hidenavigation=1&theme=dark){rel="nofollow"}

Or locally:

1.  Clone this repository
2.  Install dependencies using `pnpm install`
3.  Start development server using `pnpm dev`
